_waiting_for_players_ready_: Waiting for players to be ready...
_concede_confirmation_: Are you sure you want to concede?
_rulebook_setup_:
Setup 

 The game is played on an 8x8 board with alternating dark and light squares. Only the dark squares are used for movement. 

 Each player starts with 12 pieces placed on the three rows closest to them.
_rulebook_piece_movement_:
Piece Movement:

Pieces move diagonally forward to an adjacent dark square.

A piece captures an opponentâ€™s piece by jumping over it diagonally to an empty square directly behind it.

If a jump is available, you must take it.
_rulebook_piece_capture_:
Multiple Captures:

If after capturing an opponent's piece, the capturing piece can make another capture, it must continue. Multiple captures are mandatory, and the player must make all available jumps until no further moves are possible.
_rulebook_king_movement_:
King Movement:

When a piece reaches the last row on the opposite side of the board, it becomes a King.

Kings can move diagonally forward or backward.

Kings capture like regular pieces but can jump in any diagonal direction.
_rulebook_timers_:
Timer System:

Each player has a timer for a 3 minute total. The timer alternates between players each turn, and if a player's timer runs out, they lose the game. When 30 seconds remain, the timer will flash red.
